Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Nice little bar close to the red light district. We had a drink here in the day time and it was a good refuge from the more crazy bars with music and live sports running. The man serving was friendly and service was good. Cash only, so make sure your not relying on credit cards. Worth a visit.

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Great cafe with lots of different types of bread, cakes, drinks, juices, pancakes etc. Also has a few books and leaflets about where to visit in the local area.
